name: Nonsense Soccer
description:
⚽ Nonsense Soccer ⚽ is a platformer-soccer-hybrid for people who like chaotic local multiplayer games. At its core it's a fun little soccer game with simple controls for up to 4 players. With 7 cool multiplayer arenas and a short but sweet target practice mode for solo players, there's already hours of fun to be had with, with more content to be added in the future.



⚽Update #2 out now! ⚽

  • New kick targeting controls
  • New wall jump ability
  • A new arena
  • New target practice mode!
  • Removed game launcher
  • New menus
  • Added improved graphics and sound settings to menus
  • Lots of visual improvements
  • Some new gameplay mechanics and other improvements

This game is in an early access state and does not represent the final quality of the product. Expect weird bugs, things looking & behaving crazy and all the other fun things and some work-in-progress things that make the game not fun. It's highly recommended to give feedback and bug reports in the community, send me video links to YouTube, ping me on Twitter and all the stuff like that.
